{"name": "Mecklenburg County-SNAP Assistance (Freedom Dr.)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit" http://www.ncdhhs.gov/sunbucksapplication
Ways to Apply
Applications can be submitted one of several ways:

Apply online with North Carolina ePASS
Apply and submit documents through All Access Point
Mail the completed application to 301 Billingsley Road, Charlotte, NC 28211
Drop off a completed application or apply in person at one of our three locations:
 
Ella B. Scarborough Community Resource Center - 430 Stitt Road, Charlotte, NC 28213
Valerie C. Woodard Community Resource Center - 3205 Freedom Drive Suite 1000, Charlotte, NC 28208
Wallace H. Kuralt Center -  301 Billingsley Road, Charlotte, NC 28211 
 
Call 704-336-3000 to complete a telephone application.
Benefits cannot be used to purchase items such as detergents, paper products, tobacco products, or alcoholic beverages.", "email": "", "url": "https://dcr.mecknc.gov/services/food-and-nutrition-services", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "3205 Freedom Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Ashley Park", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28208", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2436621, "longitude": -80.8937364}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 336-3000", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}]}
